[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@mahadao/arth-ethers](./arth-ethers.md) &gt; [EthersARTH](./arth-ethers.ethersarth.md)

## EthersARTH class

Convenience class that combines multiple interfaces of the library in one object.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class EthersARTH implements ReadableEthersARTH, TransactableARTH 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [ReadableEthersARTH](./arth-ethers.readableethersarth.md)<!-- -->, TransactableARTH

## Remarks

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `EthersARTH` class.

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [connection](./arth-ethers.ethersarth.connection.md) |  | [EthersARTHConnection](./arth-ethers.ethersarthconnection.md) | Information about the connection to the ARTH protocol. |
|  [populate](./arth-ethers.ethersarth.populate.md) |  | [PopulatableEthersARTH](./arth-ethers.populatableethersarth.md) | Can be used to create populated (unsigned) transactions. |
|  [send](./arth-ethers.ethersarth.send.md) |  | [SendableEthersARTH](./arth-ethers.sendableethersarth.md) | Can be used to send transactions without waiting for them to be mined. |
